SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.infrastructure

Class InMemoryStockRepository

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.infrastructure.InMemoryStockRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
StockRepository
public class InMemoryStockRepository extends Object implements StockRepository
In-memory implementation of the StockRepository interface. Uses CSV-based loader to read price history and descriptions, and caches created IStock instances for reuse.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    InMemoryStockRepository(Path csvPath)
    Constructs the repository with a path to the ASX price CSV.
    InMemoryStockRepository(Path priceCsvPath, Path descCsvPath)
    Constructs the repository with paths to the ASX price CSV and a descriptions CSV.

  • Constructor Details

    • InMemoryStockRepository

      public InMemoryStockRepository(Path csvPath) throws IOException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
      Constructs the repository with a path to the ASX price CSV. Descriptions are not loaded in this constructor.
      Parameters:
      csvPath - path to the ASX price data CSV file
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading the CSV fails
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException - if the CSV content is invalid

    • InMemoryStockRepository

      public InMemoryStockRepository(Path priceCsvPath, Path descCsvPath) throws IOException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
      Constructs the repository with paths to the ASX price CSV and a descriptions CSV. The descriptions CSV must contain rows of ticker, short description, and long description.
      Parameters:
      priceCsvPath - path to the ASX price data CSV file
      descCsvPath - path to the CSV containing stock descriptions
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading either CSV fails
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException - if the CSV content is invalid

  • Method Details

    • availableTickers

      public Set<String> availableTickers()
      Returns the set of all ticker symbols available in the price CSV.
      Specified by:
      availableTickers in interface StockRepository
      Returns:
      a set of ticker strings

    • getByTicker

      public IStock getByTicker(String ticker)
      Retrieves or creates an IStock instance for the given ticker. Price history is loaded on first request and stored in cache. If no history exists for the ticker, a stub record with zero values for the current date is used. Descriptions default to blank if absent.
      Specified by:
      getByTicker in interface StockRepository
      Parameters:
      ticker - the stock ticker symbol
      Returns:
      an IStock instance containing price history and descriptions

    • getAll

      public List<IStock> getAll()
      Returns a list of IStock instances for all available tickers. Stocks are retrieved in the order of the available tickers set iteration.
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface StockRepository
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of all loaded IStock instances
